service.method: SELECT DISTINCT CNHD.EXEC_NO , CONVERT_DATE(CNHD.CHANGE_DATE) AS CHANGE_DATE , CNHD.SUBJECT , (SELECT SUM(ITEM_AMT) FROM ICOYCNDT WHERE EXEC_NO = CNHD.EXEC_NO) EXEC_AMT_KRW , CNHD.CTRL_CODE CTRL_CODE_NAME , VNGL.VENDOR_CODE AS PO_SELLER_CODE , VNGL.VENDOR_NAME_LOC AS PO_SELLER_NAME , CNDT.RFQ_NO AS RFQ_NUMBER , CNDT.RFQ_COUNT AS RFQ_COUNT , CNHD.EXEC_NO AS EXEC_NUMBER , '0' AS EXEC_COUNT , ECCT.CONT_NO AS CONT_NUMBER , ECCT.CONT_GL_SEQ AS CONT_GL_SEQ , '0' AS PO_COUNT , '' AS PURCHASER_NAME FROM ICOYCNHD CNHD , ICOYCNDT CNDT , ICOMVNGL VNGL , SCPGL ECCT WHERE 1 = 1 AND CNHD.HOUSE_CODE = $S{house_code} AND CNHD.SIGN_STATUS = 'E' AND CNHD.STATUS != 'D' AND CNHD.HOUSE_CODE = CNDT.HOUSE_CODE AND CNHD.EXEC_NO = CNDT.EXEC_NO AND CNHD.ADD_USER_ID = $S{ctrl_person_id} AND CNDT.CONTRACT_FLAG = 'Y' AND CNDT.STATUS != 'D' AND CNDT.EXEC_NO = ECCT.EXEC_NO(+) AND ECCT.CONT_NO IS NULL AND CNDT.STATUS != 'D' AND CNDT.HOUSE_CODE = VNGL.HOUSE_CODE AND CNDT.VENDOR_CODE = VNGL.VENDOR_CODE AND VNGL.VENDOR_NAME_LOC LIKE '%' || $S{vendor_name_loc} || '%' UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT CNHD.EXEC_NO , CONVERT_DATE(CNHD.CHANGE_DATE) AS CHANGE_DATE , CNHD.SUBJECT , (SELECT SUM(ITEM_AMT) FROM ICOYCNDT WHERE EXEC_NO = CNHD.EXEC_NO) EXEC_AMT_KRW , CNHD.CTRL_CODE CTRL_CODE_NAME , VNGL.VENDOR_CODE AS PO_SELLER_CODE , VNGL.VENDOR_NAME_LOC AS PO_SELLER_NAME , CNDT.RFQ_NO AS RFQ_NUMBER , CNDT.RFQ_COUNT AS RFQ_COUNT , CNHD.EXEC_NO AS EXEC_NUMBER , '0' AS EXEC_COUNT --, ECCT.CONT_NO AS CONT_NUMBER --, ECCT.CONT_GL_SEQ AS CONT_GL_SEQ , '' AS CONT_NUMBER , '' AS CONT_GL_SEQ , '0' AS PO_COUNT , '' AS PURCHASER_NAME FROM ICOYCNHD CNHD , ICOYCNDT CNDT , ICOMVNGL VNGL , SCPGL ECCT , ( SELECT EXEC_NO,COUNT(*) CNT FROM SCPGL GROUP BY EXEC_NO ) ECCT1 , ( SELECT EXEC_NO,COUNT(*) CNT FROM SCPGL WHERE CT_FLAG = 'CL' GROUP BY EXEC_NO ) ECCT2 /* , ( SELECT CONT_NO,EXEC_NO,MAX(CONT_GL_SEQ) CONT_GL_SEQ FROM SCPGL WHERE CT_FLAG = 'CL' GROUP BY CONT_NO,EXEC_NO ) ECCT3 */ WHERE 1 = 1 AND CNHD.HOUSE_CODE = $S{house_code} AND CNHD.SIGN_STATUS = 'E' AND CNHD.STATUS != 'D' AND CNHD.HOUSE_CODE = CNDT.HOUSE_CODE AND CNHD.EXEC_NO = CNDT.EXEC_NO AND CNHD.ADD_USER_ID = $S{ctrl_person_id} AND CNDT.CONTRACT_FLAG = 'Y' AND CNDT.STATUS != 'D' AND CNDT.EXEC_NO = ECCT.EXEC_NO AND ECCT.EXEC_NO = ECCT1.EXEC_NO AND ECCT.EXEC_NO = ECCT2.EXEC_NO /* AND ECCT.EXEC_NO = ECCT3.EXEC_NO */ AND ECCT1.CNT = ECCT2.CNT /* AND ECCT3.CONT_GL_SEQ = ECCT.CONT_GL_SEQ */ AND CNDT.STATUS != 'D' AND CNDT.HOUSE_CODE = VNGL.HOUSE_CODE AND CNDT.VENDOR_CODE = VNGL.VENDOR_CODE AND VNGL.VENDOR_NAME_LOC LIKE '%' || $S{vendor_name_loc} || '%' ORDER BY CNHD.EXEC_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT ( * ) CNT FROM SCTGL WHERE 1 = 1 AND CONT_NUMBER = $S{cont_number} AND CONT_GL_SEQ = $S{cont_gl_seq}

INSERT INTO SCTSG ( COMPANY_TYPE ,SIGN_CONTENT ,SIGN_DATA ,CONT_NUMBER ,CONT_COUNT ,ADD_DATE ) VALUES ( ${sctsg_company_type} ,${sctsg_sign_content} ,${sctsg_sign_data} ,${cont_number} ,${cont_gl_seq} ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyymmdd') )

INSERT INTO SSIGN ( CONT_NO ,CONT_COUNT ,SIGN_HASH ,SIGN_VALUE ,ADD_USER_ID ,ADD_DATE ,ADD_TIME ,CHANGE_USER_ID ,CHANGE_DATE ,CHANGE_TIME ,DEL_FLAG ,SIGN_KEY ) VALUES ( ${cont_number} ,${cont_gl_seq} ,${sctsg_sign_data} ,${sign_value} ,${session_user_id} ,${current_date} ,${current_time} ,${session_user_id} ,${current_date} ,${current_time} ,${cont_gl_seq} ,${sign_key} )
SELECT MAX ( EXEC_NUMBER ) FROM SCTGL WHERE 1=1 AND CONT_NUMBER = $S{cont_number}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT DRLN.EXEC_NO AS EXEC_NUMBER , DRLN.EXEC_SEQ , GETDATEFORMAT ( DRGL.ADD_DATE ) AS PO_CREATE_DATE , DRGL.SUBJECT , GETCTRLCODENAME ( '100' , DRGL.COMPANY_CODE , 'P' , DRGL.CTRL_CODE ) AS CTRL_CODE_NAME , DRLN.VENDOR_CODE AS SELLER_CODE , DRGL.COMPANY_CODE , DRLN.RFQ_NO AS RFQ_NUMBER , DRLN.RFQ_COUNT , DRLN.RD_DATE , DRGL.EXEC_AMT_KRW AS CONT_AMT , DRGL.PAY_TERMS , GETCODETEXT1 ( 'M421_1' , DRGL.PAY_TERMS , 'KO' ) AS PAY_TERMS_TEXT , DRLN.CUR , CMGL.COMPANY_NAME_LOC AS BUYER_COMPANY_NAME , B_ADDR.ADDRESS_LOC AS BUYER_COMPANY_ADDR1 , B_ADDR.CEO_NAME_LOC AS BUYER_COMPANY_CEO_NAME , SUGL.VENDOR_NAME_LOC AS SELLER_COMPANY_NAME , S_ADDR.ADDRESS_LOC AS SELLER_COMPANY_ADDR1 , S_ADDR.CEO_NAME_LOC AS SELLER_COMPANY_CEO_NAME , '#zero#' AS CONT_AMT_TEXT , '#zero#' AS CONT_TTL_AMT_TEXT , ( DRGL.EXEC_AMT_KRW * 0.1 ) + DRGL.EXEC_AMT_KRW AS CONT_TTL_AMT , '#zero#' AS CONT_VAT_TEXT , DRGL.EXEC_AMT_KRW * 0.1 AS CONT_VAT , DRLN.UNIT_MEASURE AS UNIT_MEASURE1 , SUBSTR ( REPLACE ( B_ADDR.ZIP_CODE , '-' , NULL ) , 1 , 3 ) AS BUYER_COMPANY_ZIP_CODE1 , SUBSTR ( REPLACE ( B_ADDR.ZIP_CODE , '-' , NULL ) , 4 , 3 ) AS BUYER_COMPANY_ZIP_CODE2 , SUBSTR ( REPLACE ( S_ADDR.ZIP_CODE , '-' , NULL ) , 1 , 3 ) AS SELLER_COMPANY_ZIP_CODE1 , SUBSTR ( REPLACE ( S_ADDR.ZIP_CODE , '-' , NULL ) , 4 , 3 ) AS SELLER_COMPANY_ZIP_CODE2 , SUBSTR ( REPLACE ( CMGL.IRS_NO , '-' , NULL ) , 1 , 3 ) || '-' || SUBSTR ( REPLACE ( CMGL.IRS_NO , '-' , NULL ) , 4 , 2 ) || '-' || SUBSTR ( REPLACE ( CMGL.IRS_NO , '-' , NULL ) , 6 , 5 ) AS BUYER_COMPANY_IRS_NO , SUBSTR ( REPLACE ( SUGL.IRS_NO , '-' , NULL ) , 1 , 3 ) || '-' || SUBSTR ( REPLACE ( SUGL.IRS_NO , '-' , NULL ) , 4 , 2 ) || '-' || SUBSTR ( REPLACE ( SUGL.IRS_NO , '-' , NULL ) , 6 , 5 ) AS SELLER_COMPANY_IRS_NO FROM ICOYCNHD DRGL LEFT OUTER JOIN ICOYCNDT DRLN ON DRGL.EXEC_NO = DRLN.EXEC_NO LEFT JOIN ICOMCMGL CMGL ON CMGL.COMPANY_CODE = DRGL.COMPANY_CODE LEFT JOIN ICOMADDR B_ADDR ON CMGL.COMPANY_CODE = B_ADDR.CODE_NO AND B_ADDR.CODE_TYPE = '1' LEFT JOIN ICOMVNGL SUGL ON SUGL.VENDOR_CODE = DRLN.VENDOR_CODE LEFT JOIN ICOMADDR S_ADDR ON SUGL.VENDOR_CODE = S_ADDR.CODE_NO AND S_ADDR.CODE_TYPE = '2' WHERE 1 = 1 AND DRGL.HOUSE_CODE = ${session.HOUSE_CODE} AND DRGL.COMPANY_CODE = ${company_code} AND DRGL.EXEC_NO = ${exec_no} AND DRGL.SIGN_STATUS = 'E' ) A ORDER BY EXEC_NUMBER DESC , EXEC_SEQ ASC

SELECT CTGL.COMPANY_CODE ,CTGL.CONT_NUMBER ,CTGL.CONT_GL_SEQ ,CTGL.PO_NUMBER ,CTGL.PO_COUNT ,CTGL.PROJECT_NAME AS PJ_NAME ,CTGL.PROJECT_CODE ,CTGL.SUBJECT ,CTGL.CONT_TYPE ,CTGL.POR_NAME ,CTGL.CONT_METHOD ,CTGL.CHANGE_METHOD ,CTGL.CONT_DATE ,CTGL.CONT_ADD_DATE ,CTGL.CONT_AMT ,CTGL.ADD_DATE ,CTGL.ADD_TIME ,CTGL.ADD_USER_ID ,CTGL.CHANGE_DATE ,CTGL.CHANGE_TIME ,CTGL.CHANGE_USER_ID ,CTGL.DEL_FLAG ,CTGL.CONT_FROM ,CTGL.CONT_TO ,CTGL.SIGN_PERSON_ID ,CTGL.SIGN_PERSON_DEP ,CTGL.OPER_DEP ,CTGL.OPER_CHARGE ,CTGL.PROJET_MANAGER ,CTGL.CLIENT_NAME ,CTGL.EX_WORK ,CTGL.SELLER_CODE ,CTGL.ADD_TAX_FLAG ,CTGL.DELAY_CHARGE ,CTGL.BD_NUMBER ,CTGL.ST_DATE ,CTGL.RD_DATE ,CTGL.PAY_TERMS_TEXT ,CTGL.PAY_TERMS ,CTGL.REMARK ,CTGL.FIRST_AMT ,CTGL.THIRD_AMT ,CTGL.SECOND_AMT_01 ,CTGL.SECOND_AMT_02 ,CTGL.SECOND_AMT_03 ,CTGL.SECOND_AMT_04 ,CTGL.SECOND_AMT_05 ,CTGL.FIRST_AMT_RATIO ,CTGL.THIRD_AMT_RATIO ,CTGL.SECOND_AMT_RATIO_01 ,CTGL.SECOND_AMT_RATIO_02 ,CTGL.SECOND_AMT_RATIO_03 ,CTGL.SECOND_AMT_RATIO_04 ,CTGL.SECOND_AMT_RATIO_05 ,CTGL.FIRST_AMT_TIME ,CTGL.THIRD_AMT_TIME ,CTGL.SECOND_AMT_TIME_01 ,CTGL.SECOND_AMT_TIME_02 ,CTGL.SECOND_AMT_TIME_03 ,CTGL.SECOND_AMT_TIME_04 ,CTGL.SECOND_AMT_TIME_05 ,CTGL.FIRST_AMT_DATE ,CTGL.THIRD_AMT_DATE ,CTGL.SECOND_AMT_DATE_01 ,CTGL.SECOND_AMT_DATE_02 ,CTGL.SECOND_AMT_DATE_03 ,CTGL.SECOND_AMT_DATE_04 ,CTGL.SECOND_AMT_DATE_05 ,CTGL.FIRST_AMT_PAY ,CTGL.THIRD_AMT_PAY ,CTGL.SECOND_AMT_PAY_01 ,CTGL.SECOND_AMT_PAY_02 ,CTGL.SECOND_AMT_PAY_03 ,CTGL.SECOND_AMT_PAY_04 ,CTGL.SECOND_AMT_PAY_05 ,CTGL.PRE_INS_AMT ,CTGL.PRE_INS_PERCENT ,CTGL.PRE_INS_DATE ,CTGL.CONT_INS_AMT ,CTGL.CONT_INS_PERCENT ,CTGL.CONT_INS_FROM ,CTGL.CONT_INS_TO ,CTGL.FAULT_INS_AMT ,CTGL.FAULT_INS_PERCENT ,CTGL.FAULT_INS_FROM ,CTGL.FAULT_INS_TO ,CTGL.ATTACH_NO ,CTGL.ATTACH_NO_USER ,CTGL.ATTACH_NO1 ,CTGL.ATTACH_NO1_USER ,CTGL.ATTACH_NO2 ,FILE2.SRC_FILE_NAME AS ATTACH_NAME2 ,CTGL.ATTACH_NO2_USER ,CTGL.ATTACH_NO3 ,FILE3.SRC_FILE_NAME AS ATTACH_NAME3 ,CTGL.ATTACH_NO3_USER ,CTGL.ATTACH_NO4 ,FILE4.SRC_FILE_NAME AS ATTACH_NAME4 ,CTGL.ATTACH_NO4_USER ,CTGL.INS_VENDOR_NO ,CTGL.CONT_INS_NO ,CTGL.ATTACH_CONT_INS_NO ,CTGL.FAULT_INS_NO ,CTGL.ATTACH_FAULT_INS_NO ,CTGL.CONT_INS_FLAG ,CTGL.FAULT_INS_FLAG ,CTGL.CONT_REJECT_REASON ,CTGL.CONT_INS_PATH ,CTGL.FAULT_INS_PATH ,CTGL.PRE_INS_NO ,CTGL.ATTACH_PRE_INS_NO ,CTGL.PRE_INS_FLAG ,CTGL.PRE_INS_PATH ,CTGL.ATTACH_INS_XMLNO ,CTGL.ATTACH_FAL_XMLNO ,CTGL.ATTACH_PRE_XMLNO ,CTGL.DISCARD_DATE ,CTGL.DISCARD_REASON ,CTGL.CT_FLAG ,CASE WHEN CTGL.CT_FLAG = 'CC' OR CTGL.CT_FLAG = 'CD' THEN '#seller_sign#' END AS BUYER_APP_SUCCESS ,CASE WHEN CTGL.CT_FLAG = 'CD' THEN '#buyer_sign#' END AS SELLER_APP_SUCCESS ,CTGL.TEXT_NUMBER ,CTGL.CTRL_CODE ,CTGL.PAY_TERMS_TEXT_1 ,CTGL.ERP_FLAG ,CTGL.RIVISION_REASON_TEXT ,CTGL.PLANT_CODE ,CTGL.RIVISION_REASON ,CTGL.PO_NAME ,CTGL.SURETY_FLAG ,CTGL.PREINS_SELLER_CHECK ,CTGL.CONINS_SELLER_CHECK ,CTGL.FLRINS_SELLER_CHECK ,CTGL.SEND_DATE ,CTGL.SEL_ACCEPT_DATE ,CTGL.BUY_ACCEPT_DATE ,CTGL.SEL_REG_NO ,CTGL.BUYER_COMPANY_IRS_NO ,CTGL.BUYER_COMPANY_NAME ,CTGL.BUYER_COMPANY_ADDR AS BUYER_COMPANY_ADDR1 ,CTGL.BUYER_COMPANY_CEO_NAME ,CTGL.SELLER_COMPANY_IRS_NO ,CTGL.SELLER_COMPANY_NAME ,CTGL.SELLER_COMPANY_ADDR AS SELLER_COMPANY_ADDR1 ,CTGL.SELLER_COMPANY_CEO_NAME ,CTGL.CONT_AMT_TEXT ,CTGL.CONT_TTL_AMT_TEXT ,CTGL.CONT_TTL_AMT ,CTGL.CONT_VAT_TEXT ,CTGL.CONT_VAT ,CTGL.BUYER_COMPANY_ZIP_CODE1 ,CTGL.BUYER_COMPANY_ZIP_CODE2 ,CTGL.SELLER_COMPANY_ZIP_CODE1 ,CTGL.SELLER_COMPANY_ZIP_CODE2 ,CTGL.BUYER_COMPANY_ADDR2 ,CTGL.SELLER_COMPANY_ADDR2 ,CTGL.LOCATION ,CTGL.PAY_TERMS_DATE ,CTGL.PAY_TERMS_PERCENT ,CASE WHEN CTGL.PAY_TERMS_SPEC_FLAG = LOWER('true') THEN 'checked' ELSE '' END AS PAY_TERMS_SPEC_FLAG ,CTGL.PERIOD_CHECK ,CTGL.DELAY_PRICE ,CTGL.PRE_INS_PERCENT_TEXT ,CTGL.DELAY_DATE1 ,CTGL.DELAY_PRICE1 ,CTGL.DELAY_REMARK1 ,CTGL.DELAY_DATE2 ,CTGL.DELAY_PRICE2 ,CTGL.DELAY_REMARK2 ,CTGL.DELAY_REMARK3 ,CTGL.CONFIRM_METHOD ,CTGL.MUTUAL_DISTRICT ,CTGL.PRESIDENT ,CTGL.PAY_TERMS_SPEC ,CTGL.CONTRACT_EFFECT ,CTGL.DESCRIPTION1 ,CTGL.UNIT_MEASURE1 ,CTGL.ITEM_QTY1 ,CTGL.UNIT_PRICE1 ,CTGL.ITEM_AMT1 ,CTGL.DESCRIPTION2 ,CTGL.UNIT_MEASURE2 ,CTGL.ITEM_QTY2 ,CTGL.UNIT_PRICE2 ,CTGL.ITEM_AMT2 ,CTGL.DESCRIPTION3 ,CASE WHEN CTGL.TEAM_VIEW = LOWER('true') THEN 'checked' ELSE '' END AS TEAM_VIEW ,CASE WHEN CTGL.DIFFERENT_TEAM_VIEW = LOWER('true') THEN 'checked' ELSE '' END AS DIFFERENT_TEAM_VIEW ,CASE WHEN CTGL.APP_TEAM_MANAGER = LOWER('true') THEN 'checked' ELSE '' END AS APP_TEAM_MANAGER ,CASE WHEN CTGL.APP_JUDICIAL = LOWER('true') THEN 'checked' ELSE '' END AS APP_JUDICIAL ,CTGL.APP_TEAM_MANAGER_TEXT ,CTGL.APP_JUDICIAL_TEXT ,CTGL.PERSON_CHARGE_PHONE1 ,CTGL.PERSON_CHARGE_PHONE2 ,CTGL.PERSON_CHARGE_PHONE3 ,SUGL.SIGN_VALUE ,SUGL.SIGN_NAME ,CTGL.CONT_CONTENTS ,CTGL.MIGRATION_REMARK FROM SCTGL CTGL LEFT OUTER JOIN ICOMATCH FILE2 ON CTGL.ATTACH_NO2 = FILE2.DOC_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ICOMATCH FILE3 ON CTGL.ATTACH_NO3 = FILE3.DOC_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ICOMATCH FILE4 ON CTGL.ATTACH_NO4 = FILE4.DOC_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ICOMVNGL SUGL ON CTGL.SELLER_CODE = SUGL.VENDOR_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND CTGL.CONT_NUMBER = ${cont_number} AND CTGL.CONT_GL_SEQ = ${cont_gl_seq}

SELECT CT.CONT_NUMBER AS CONT_NUMBER , CT.CONT_GL_SEQ AS CONT_GL_SEQ , CT.PRE_INS_NO AS PRE_INS_NO , CT.CONT_INS_NO AS CONT_INS_NO , CT.FAULT_INS_NO AS FAULT_INS_NO , CT.SELLER_CODE AS SELLER_CODE , CT.PRE_INS_PERCENT AS PRE_INS_PERCENT , CT.FAULT_INS_PERCENT AS FAULT_INS_PERCENT , CT.CONT_INS_PERCENT AS CONT_INS_PERCENT , CT.CONT_AMT AS CONT_AMT , CT.PRE_INS_FLAG AS PRE_INS_FLAG , CT.CONT_INS_FLAG AS CONT_INS_FLAG , CT.FAULT_INS_FLAG AS FAULT_INS_FLAG , TO_DATE(CT.CONT_TO,'YYYYMMDD') - ADD_MONTHS ( TO_DATE(CT.CONT_TO,'YYYYMMDD') , NVL(TO_NUMBER(CT.FAULT_INS_FROM),0)) AS FAULT_DATE_PERIOD , TO_NUMBER ( TO_NUMBER ( CT.CONT_AMT ) * TO_NUMBER ( CT.PRE_INS_PERCENT ) / 100 ) AS PRE_INS_AMT , TO_NUMBER ( TO_NUMBER ( CT.CONT_AMT ) * TO_NUMBER ( CT.FAULT_INS_PERCENT ) / 100 ) AS FAULT_INS_AMT , TO_NUMBER ( TO_NUMBER ( CT.CONT_AMT ) * TO_NUMBER ( CT.CONT_INS_PERCENT ) / 100 ) AS CONT_INS_AMT , CT.CONT_TO AS FAULT_INS_FROM , TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS ( TO_DATE(CT.CONT_TO,'YYYYMMDD') , NVL(TO_NUMBER(CT.FAULT_INS_FROM),0))-1,'YYYYMMDD') AS FAULT_INS_TO , CT.SUBJECT AS SUBJECT , CT.CONT_DATE AS CONT_DATE , CT.CONT_FROM AS CONT_FROM , CT.CONT_TO AS CONT_TO , REPLACE ( CT.BUYER_COMPANY_IRS_NO , '-' , NULL ) AS BUYER_COMPANY_IRS_NO , CT.BUYER_COMPANY_NAME AS BUYER_COMPANY_NAME , CT.BUYER_COMPANY_ADDR || ' ' ||CT.BUYER_COMPANY_ADDR2 AS BUYER_COMPANY_ADDR , CT.BUYER_COMPANY_CEO_NAME AS BUYER_COMPANY_CEO_NAME , CT.BUYER_COMPANY_ZIP_CODE1 || CT.BUYER_COMPANY_ZIP_CODE2 AS BUYER_ZIP_CODE , REPLACE ( CT.SELLER_COMPANY_IRS_NO , '-' , NULL ) AS SELLER_COMPANY_IRS_NO , CT.SELLER_COMPANY_NAME AS SELLER_COMPANY_NAME , CT.SELLER_COMPANY_ADDR || ' ' || CT.SELLER_COMPANY_ADDR2 AS SELLER_COMPANY_ADDR , CT.SELLER_COMPANY_CEO_NAME AS SELLER_COMPANY_CEO_NAME , CT.SELLER_COMPANY_ZIP_CODE1 || CT.SELLER_COMPANY_ZIP_CODE2 AS SELLER_ZIP_CODE , CT.ADD_USER_ID AS BUYER_USER_ID , MT.USER_NAME_LOC AS BUYER_USER_NAME , MT.DEPT AS BUYER_DEPT , PT.DEPT_NAME_LOC AS BUYER_DEPT_NAME , DR.EMAIL AS BUYER_EMAIL , CASE WHEN DR.PHONE_NO1 IS NULL OR DR.PHONE_NO1 = '' OR DR.PHONE_NO1 = ' ' THEN DR.PHONE_NO2 ELSE DR.PHONE_NO1 END AS BUYER_PHONE_NO1 , CASE WHEN DR.PHONE_NO2 IS NULL OR DR.PHONE_NO2 = '' OR DR.PHONE_NO2 = ' ' THEN DR.PHONE_NO1 ELSE DR.PHONE_NO2 END AS BUYER_PHONE_NO2 , CT.SELLER_CODE AS SELLER_USER_ID , PI.USER_NAME AS SELLER_USER_NAME , PI.DIVISION AS SELLER_DEPT_NAME , PI.EMAIL AS SELLER_EMAIL , PI.PHONE_NO AS SELLER_PHONE_NO1 , PI.MOBILE_NO AS SELLER_PHONE_NO2 , CASE WHEN SUBSTR ( REPLACE ( CT.SELLER_COMPANY_IRS_NO , '-' , NULL ) , 4 , 1 ) = '8' THEN 'O' ELSE 'P' END AS SOLE , CASE WHEN SUBSTR ( REPLACE ( CT.SELLER_COMPANY_IRS_NO , '-' , NULL ) , 4 , 1 ) = '8' THEN REPLACE ( CT.SELLER_COMPANY_IRS_NO , '-' , NULL ) ELSE CT.SEL_REG_NO END AS SOLE_NUMBER FROM SCTGL CT LEFT OUTER JOIN ICOMLUSR MT ON CT.ADD_USER_ID = MT.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ICOMOGDP PT ON MT.DEPT = PT.DEPT LEFT OUTER JOIN ICOMADDR DR ON MT.USER_ID = DR.CODE_NO AND DR.CODE_TYPE = '3' LEFT OUTER JOIN ICOMVNCP PI ON PI.COMPANY_CODE = CT.COMPANY_CODE AND PI.VENDOR_CODE = CT.SELLER_CODE AND PI.SEQ = '1' WHERE 1 = 1 AND CT.CONT_NUMBER = ${cont_number} AND CT.CONT_GL_SEQ = ${cont_gl_seq}
